participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: ambitious and creative, with a passion for storytelling
participant_1.background: I want to be a journalist but instead I sell washers at Sears. I love the band Red Hot Chili Peppers. I have a French bulldog. My feet are size six women's.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: nostalgic and sociable, with a sense of humor about life experiences
participant_2.background: My father used to drive a taxi cab in the 1970s. I have never been to the west coast of the United States. I was once on the local news, and not for anything illegal. I have been to Canada two times in my entire life. My uncle used to work on fish boats in Florida.

content.text: I want to be a journalist, but instead I sell washers at Sears.
My father used to drive a taxi cab in the 1970s.
That's cool. I've never been to the west coast of the United States.
I've been to Canada two times in my entire life.
I love the band Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I was once on the local news, and not for anything illegal.
That's interesting. I have a French bulldog.
My uncle used to work on fish boats in Florida.
That's cool. I have size six women's feet.
Well, it was nice talking to you.
